mapper.select: select * from reservations where username=#{username} and status = 'signed' or status = 'reserved';

SELECT a.aid, a.areaName, s.seat_number, s.is_available, r.start_time, r.end_time, r.status FROM area a JOIN seats s ON a.aid = s.aid LEFT JOIN reservations r ON s.seat_id = r.seat_id AND r.status = 'reserved' AND r.status = 'signed' AND NOT ( r.end_time <= #{start_time} OR r.start_time >= #{end_time} ) WHERE a.aid = #{aid} ORDER BY s.seat_number;
mapper.insert: insert into reservations (start_time, end_time,seat_id, username) values (#{start_time}, #{end_time}, #{seat_id}, #{username});
mapper.update: update reservations set status = 'cancelled' where reservation_id = #{reservation_id} and status = 'reserved';
mapper.select: select * from reservations where username = #{username} and status = 'reserved' or status = 'signed' or status = 'completed';
mapper.update: update reservations set status = 'signed' where reservation_id = #{reservation_id} and status = 'reserved';
update reservations set status = 'lated' where reservation_id = #{reservation_id} and status = 'reserved';
